Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ipeaplot 0.4.0

  • The Frutiger family has been replaced by the default sans-serif font in titles and labels.
  • New function save_eps()

ipeaplot 0.3.1

CRAN release: 2024-04-18

Release of ipeaplot v0.3.1 on CRAN with the following functions:

  • theme_ipea()
  • scale_color_ipea()
  • scale_fill_ipea()
  • save_eps()

On this page

Developed by Pedro Ferreira, Pedro Jorge, Daniel Lima, Gustavo Coelho, Rafael H. M. Pereira, Lucas Mation, Ipea - Institue for Applied Economic Research.
